title: Valdosta State University Rugby Club
text: The Valdosta State University Rugby Club is the intercollegiate men's <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> team that represents <a href="Valdosta%20State%20University">Valdosta State University</a> in the <a href="USA%20Rugby">USA Rugby</a> league. The club has a very active social life on and off campus. The club is also regularly contacted by <a href="University%20of%20the%20West%20of%20Scotland%20Rugby%20Football%20Club">University of the West of Scotland Rugby Football Club</a> of <a href="Scotland">Scotland</a> whose university is an international partner of VSU.
